text:
WeWork | New York, NY (NYC) | Full Time | ONSITE | https://www.wework.com/careers#digital

WeWork is hiring for full-stack engineers at all levels. We build all member-facing software and the core backoffice systems that run the business.

WeWork provides tens of thousands of members around the world with space, community and services that enable them to do what they love and create their life's work. Our hunger for building great spaces; empowering startups, freelancers, and small businesses; and connecting interesting people is far from being satisfied. Weâ€™re just getting started, and our journey gets increasingly exciting as more team members join the movement.
